name: Mahmood Kohzad
story: Abdul-Aziz Amani was born and raised in the small village of Kandahar in Afghanistan. His father was a respected Imam in the local mosque, and Abdul-Aziz grew up in a deeply religious household. He always knew he wanted to help people, and after finishing high school, he joined the Afghan National Army. He quickly proved himself to be a skilled Combat Life Saver and was later recruited by the OPFOR. Abdul-Aziz's calm and collected demeanor make him a valuable asset in high-pressure situations. He remains single, dedicated to his work and his faith.
